title: Smile Ecommerce Site
description: A sleek, full-featured e-commerce platform built with Next.js, TypeScript, and Prisma. Smile Fashion Brand delivers a modern shopping experience with dark mode, real-time cart updates, and a responsive, mobile-first UI. Featuring secure authentication via NextAuth.js, advanced product filtering, and an intuitive admin dashboard for product and order management, it embodies both technical precision and design elegance.

title: Admin Management System
description: A modern, responsive admin dashboard built with React, Vite, and TailwindCSS. This system offers a unified interface for administrators and users to manage tasks, memos, messages, and performance metrics. It features secure authentication, real-time communication, dynamic task tracking, and full customization options for an efficient workflow.

title: Ai Summarizer
description: An intelligent web application that transforms lengthy articles into concise, meaningful summaries. Built with React, Redux Toolkit, and Vite, this AI-powered summarizer uses advanced natural language processing to deliver quick, coherent summaries that help users grasp key ideas instantly. Designed with performance and accessibility in mind, it features a sleek interface, customizable summary length, and a responsive layout for seamless use across devices.

title: Fitness Tracker Api
description: A RESTful backend built with Django REST Framework for managing user fitness activities. The Fitness Tracker API enables users to log, update, and track their workout activities while providing authentication and secure data management through JWT authorization. It includes activity history filtering, performance metrics, and full CRUD operations for both users and activities.
